section.title: Serialization
section.para: Unlike some other languages C++ doesn't have any built in support for serializing data structures/classes. So there is the choice of writing custom code or using an existing library. There are several serialization libraries including boost::serialization, s11n, Eternity.

listitem.para: Support for different project formats must be implemented as modules that can be loaded or unloaded as needed.
Must be well tested and maintained.
Cross platform i.e. Support for gcc and VC++ compilers etc.
